abstract: New York Times readers sit atop the Start/Sit Accuracy Challenge at FantasyPros.com
snippet: New York Times readers sit atop the Start/Sit Accuracy Challenge at FantasyPros.com
lead_paragraph: The New York Times has a reputation for having an intellectually advanced readership. Who would have thought, though, that this high I.Q. would also apply to fantasy football predictions? The readers of this blog happen to be sitting atop our Start/Sit Accuracy Challenge, which tracks how accurate several communities are at making our most difficult "Who should I start?" decisions. Congratulations on the strong showing thus far.

headline.main: After 4 Weeks, the 2011 Top Fantasy Football Experts
